name: The blind girl and her loyal boy
name_original: The blind girl and her loyal boy
description:
Help the blind girl go home safely!

Press z to shoot projectile as blind human 

Press x to switch to your pet or to yourself 

Press c to carry your pet when you're in human mode 

Press c to bark if you're in dog mode Barking will scare off some monster away but larger ones might not be easily scared.

Press R to restart level

Made for the GDevelop #2 Game Jam with the theme of pets and companions.

Play on Liluo: The blind girl and her loyal boy - Liluo

Special thanks to OpenGameArt.org for providing me access to excellent assets for my game!
